definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Few drinks at the dinner will find us all snoozed at the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭来几杯，过会纷纷睡倒在沙发上了。

sentences.english: We chose a low sofa that does not block the views.
sentences.chinese: 我们选了一个很矮的沙发，不会挡住风景。

sentences.english: Meet 1 & 2 Sofa at the Shanghai InteriorLifestyle exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 壹和贰沙发在上海时尚家居展亮相。

sentences.english: I went to the sofa to rest and imagine tomorrow's sunset.
sentences.chinese: 我坐到沙发上去休息，想象着明天的日落会是怎样。

sentences.english: I am served my meals on my couch.
sentences.chinese: 有人给我端来饭菜，我就在沙发上进餐。

sentences.english: That is a very foolish trick, Fanny, to be idling away your time upon a sofa.
sentences.chinese: 范妮，在沙发上把时间混过去，这可是个坏习惯。

sentences.english: Compare "prices" for Avanti sofa, accessories and save.
sentences.chinese: 比较研究阿凡提的沙发和配件价格和保存。

sentences.english: You can bed down on the settee.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡在中型沙发上。

sentences.english: No one can move the sofa single-handed.
In the darkness, he was graceful and lonely, standing on the top of the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 站在沙发的靠背顶端，高贵又孤单。

sentences.english: This doesn’t mean that you should sit on your couch all day.
sentences.chinese: 当然这并不意味着你应该整天坐在沙发上无所事事。

sentences.english: Sofa appears the paint film of ligneous component wants smooth, colour and lustre is even.
sentences.chinese: 沙发外露木制部件的漆膜要光滑，色泽均匀。

sentences.english: She sat on the sofa quietly.
The lovers kissed and cuddled on the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 在沙发上又是接吻又是搂抱。

sentences.english: Is your sofa a regular one or does it have a pull-out bed?
sentences.chinese: 你们的沙发是普通的还是可以拉出来当床用？

sentences.english: The apartment comes furnished with (a sofa, a television…).
sentences.chinese: 公寓带家具，沙发，电视等。

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
